predicate.note: Frames file for 'alleviate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: inanimate causer
example.text: Barge rates on the Mississippi River sank yesterday on speculation that widespread rain [*ICH*-3] this week in the Midwest might temporarily alleviate the situation .

example.name: agentive
example.text: American Telephone & Telegraph Co. , MCI Communications Inc. and United Telecommunications ' U S Sprint unit were blocking phone calls into the Bay area [*-1] to alleviate congestion .
example.arg: [*-1] -> American Telephone & Telegraph Co. , MCI Communications Inc. and United Telecommunications ' U S Sprint unit
